conbody.p: When making a multiple input connections:

ul.li:
From the output of each source component, click the "result" icon and then click the "input" icon on the target component that will be connected to a source component (see Figure 6-18). NEED TO USE THIS HANDS-ON TO VERIFY HOW IT WORKS
There are no limits to the number of connections you can define to a target component.
When an input target component has more than one source component as its input, a "blue" brick appears in the input icon on the target component.
ï‚Ÿ Click the "blue" brick on a target component to view all of its inputs, which will appear in numbered boxes in the order in which each parameter input was set to the target component.
